The goal of readmit is to provide tools to make navigating, managing, and analyzing hospital readmissions easier and more transparent.

## Installation

You can install the development version of readmit from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("centralstatz/readmit")
```
